name: CGYT
description:
CGYT

CGYT: Cat Got Your Tongue. A game where you have to catch your tongue before the cats gets it first.

Made for the Game Off 2022 game jam.

Controls
  • WASD | Arrow Keys => Moves the player
  • P => Activates the powerup you've selected
Source Code

The source code for this game is stored in GitHub and is licensed under the Apache-2.0
